Welcome back Bustercross!!! 

I am a relative newbie, and play Cyclonus, Scourge, and Myrmidon
predominantly, although there are NPC minions I have been running as
well. I have only seen you in old posts, but I have enjoyed them. Also
it is always good to see new players and old returning ones. I look
foward to seeing you in the game.

I'm curious, will you be checking out our sister group NEO CYBERTRON
WARS as well?  http://groups.yahoo.com/group/ncwrpg/

Well again welcome back, see you IC!

Preston


--- Kraftlos <kraftlos@...> wrote:

> Oh!  I just realized who you were... *smacks face*  (It's late, I

> Welcome back Bustercross!  Looks like you've been gone since June

> assuming that they're Predecons.
